text: Coming Down is the first solo album from former Bauhaus, Tones on Tail, and Love and Rockets guitar player Daniel Ash. The first single, "This Love", was a number two hit on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart in the United States, where his former bandmates Peter Murphy and David J had already scored top ten hits. Natasha Atlas sings and plays instruments on most tracks. == Track listing == # "Blue Moon" (Richard Rodgers, Lorenz Hart) # "Coming Down Fast" # "Walk This Way" (Ash, Tito Puente) # "Closer to You" # "Day Tripper" (John Lennon, Paul McCartney) # "This Love" # "Blue Angel" # "Me and My Shadow" (Dave Dreyer, Billy Rose, Al Jolson) # "Candy Darling" # "Sweet Little Liar" # "Not So Fast" # "Coming Down" == Personnel == *Bass - Daniel Ash (tracks: 1, 2, 4, 5, 7 to 11) *Producer - Daniel Ash, John Fryer (tracks: 2, 3, 5, 7 to 9, 12), John A. Rivers (tracks: 6, 10) *Vocals - Natacha Atlas (tracks: 1, 3 to 8, 11, 12) *Vocals, guitar - Daniel Ash ==References== Category:1991 debut albums Category:Daniel Ash albums Category:Beggars Banquet Records albums
title: Coming Down (album)
